name: Masjid Yayasan Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah
Masjid Pehin Datu Imam Haji Abdul Mokti
Masjid Paduka Seri Begawan Sultan Omar Ali Saifuddien
Masjid Suri Seri Begawan Raja Pengiran Anak Damit
Masjid Pengiran Anak Haji Mohammed Alam
Masjid Pengiran Anak Isteri Pengiran Anak Sarah
Masjid Duli Raja Isteri Pengiran Anak Damit
Masjid Duli Pengiran Muda Mahkota Pengiran Muda Haji Al-Muhtadee Billah
Masjid Perdana Wangsa Haji Mohammad
notes: Commonly said to be in Kg Setia but is within Kg. Tarap Bau border

name: Masjid Skim Tanah Kurnia Rakyat Jati Kg. Lambak Kiri

Masjid Rancangan Perumahan Negara Kampung Rataie

notes: Commonly said to be in Delima Satu but is within Kg. Serusop border

name: Masjid Duli Raja Isteri Pengiran Anak Damit
